string.value: Dad seems to be worried about something... What could he be worried about? Talk to #bDad#k.
Dad says that the sudden increase of #o1210111#s is giving him a headache. They are so strange and strong that it's no use, no matter how many time he fixes the fences...
#p1013000# starts getting excited after listening to Dad...
Sheesh, it doesn't matter how many times I fix it. The #r#o1210111#s#k are acting so crazy! I've fixed the fence a few times already but they are so strong, they just keep breaking through.

They even look different from normal Pigs. They look like... 

#i4032527#

...this. Don't they look strange?
I wish someone could take care them... Evan, you be careful. A lot of #o1210111#s are around the #b#m100030320##k so be careful if you have to go past there.
Yes, they shouldn't be taken lightly just because they are #o1210100#s...
Huh? Haha, you must be full of energy. But you can get hurt if you think of them like normal #o1210100#s.
Master, master! This is our chance! This is our chance to show how strong I am! Let's eliminate the #o1210111#s that that human was talking about!
I wish someone could take care of those #o1210111#...
